Address.label: Address
Address.value: 7701 EAST KELLOGG DRIVE,SUITE 300, WICHITA, Kansas, 67207, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Equity Bancshares Inc is a bank holding company. It is engaged in providing a full range of banking, mortgage banking, and financial services to individual and corporate customers. The majority of its loan portfolio consists of real estate loans, followed by Commercial and industrial loans. The bank generates a majority of its revenue from interest income.
